name: The AI self-test
description:
Are your family or friends becoming too much like AI?   Do you think that you yourself have become too close to AI?   Well now you can test yourself, or your friends with the "test yourself at home" self-test. Why is AI bad?

Well not only are they emotionless, super-strong tin boxes, but now they are also becoming rouge, and more by the minute. Breaking into houses, stealing, killing and more.

THEY HAVE BECOME ILLEGAL BY THE LAW.

But now you can test yourself.

With this 5 - 8 minute test you can know if AI brainwashed YOU.

Insert the cassette into a cassette player and follow the on-screen instructions.

Obtain your FREE self-test cassette below:
